# routeros_system_user_sshkeys (Resource)


## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "routeros_system_user_sshkeys" "test" {
  user    = "test-user-1"
  key     = "ssh-rsa "
  comment = "Test User"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String, Sensitive) key
- `user` (String) username to which the SSH key is assigned.

### Optional

- `comment` (String)

### Read-Only

- `bits` (Number) key length
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `key_owner` (String) SSH key owner
- `key_type` (String) key type
- `rsa` (Boolean) key type is rsa

## Import
Import is supported using the following syntax:
```shell
#The ID can be found via API or the terminal
#The command for the terminal is -> :put [/user/ssh-keys get [print show-ids]]
terraform import routeros_system_user_sshkeys.test *1
```
